name: The ELITE Series -  Toronto's Starcraft 2 Tournament
blurb: The ELITE Series is a fan influenced Starcraft 2 tournament that invites the best foreign players to compete for WCS points in Toronto.

rewards.reward: Supporter - You\u2019ll get a special thanks on our website and in the closing credits of the live streams. You\u2019ll also be the first one to know when ticket sales open up for non-Kickstarter buyers - if there are any left!

@Home Viewer - All of the previous tier rewards. Access to the HD version of our live stream of the finals broadcast out of the Royal Cinema in March, 2014. Plus you\u2019ll get a special Kickstarter only Founder Icon for use in stream chat.

Lemme In! - All of the previous tier rewards. One general admission to the Live Finals at the Royal Cinema in March, 2014. KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE: A specially designed Founder Button to show your e-sports pride!

Up Front, Please! - All of the previous tier rewards. You\u2019ll get to sit in the Reserved Seating area of the theatre. Seated behind only Premium ticket holders, these seats are front and centre, the best view in the house!

Only the Best for You - ($75 value after Kickstarter campaign) All of the previous tier rewards. One Premium Experience Ticket. You\u2019ll get to sit in the very front of the theatre, in the first few rows of Reserved Seating. Absolute best seats in the house. Downloadable replays for all matches - preliminaries and finals. Exclusive signing access to the players. Quick Access Badge identifying you as a premium ticket holder. Pre-Tournament Event \u2013 Check in early to avoid the line, and attend an exclusive Master Class with some of the players. KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE: Your name will be engraved on the base of the trophy that is presented to the champion!

VIP Package - Select the specific seat you want in the Premium Section of the theatre. Want front and centre? You betcha! Like an aisle seat? Sure! Front row? Done. Order of choice will be based on your backer number. A copy of the replays on a customized flash drive mailed out to you after the tournament concludes. A special Founder t-shirt in the size of your choice. (See picture below). 11\u201d x 17\u201d Thank-You Poster signed by all of the players in the finals on front, and all of the staff on back.

I Want to Feel Like a Champion too! - All of the previous tier rewards. You\u2019ll receive an exact replica of the trophy that will be presented to the champion of The ELITE Series. Shipping only applies if you do not plan to attend the tournament in person.

If Only I Could Organize a Tournament\u2026 - All of the previous tier rewards. You\u2019ll be able to have input on the players that we invite to the tournament. Always wanted to meet a player? This is your chance! We\u2019ll do our very best to get the player(s) that you want to see! You\u2019ll also get to go out for dinner with the player of your choice (who is playing in the tournament, of course).

I Always Watch the Director\u2019s Cut. - All of the previous tier rewards. This is the Total VIP package. You\u2019ll get complete behind-the-scenes access to the entire tournament. Meet the players, hang out with the crew. See how all the magic happens. You\u2019ll also have a standing invite to all of our preliminary broadcasts. Come and see the casters live and get to know the team.
I want My Name on That! - The ELITE Series will become \u201cThe ELITE Series Presented By \u2026\u201d Your name will be on all of our promotional materials, and we\u2019ll love you forever!
